item.title: Say YES!
item.description: Have you ever wondered what it would be like if you just started saying yes to life and all the opportunities that come your way? I know after watching the Yes Man movie (I recommend it!) when I was little I thought the prospect of embracing every experience sounded fun and excitingâ€¦ yet I really did not realise where it would lead me! Somehow I became a person who seemingly did so many things and ended up loving meeting people and embracing new adventures.
